Package server.parser

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CgetuHandler
    Handles the cgetu command which is a request by a client to get all the existing users which already have a name.
    ChatmHandler
    Created by m on 3/21/17.
    CommandHandler
    Created by flavia on 26.03.17.
    CpongHandler
    Created by flavia on 26.03.17.
    CquitHandler
    Created by m on 3/20/17.
    UnameHandler
    Handles the uname command by checking if - the name doesn't contain illegal characters (TODO: send error message back), - the name isn't the same as before (sends same username entered message back), - the name isn't already taken (sends suggested name back) and if the name is ok it changes the name and informs all clients about the name change or name assignment.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Command
    Created by flavia on 26.03.17.
